content: 15 measure the diameter of your sleeve should be at 2 ¾ possibly 2 you can also sit your cup on 16 top and you should see the edges of that last round fit just beyond the edge of your cup like a coaster if not at this point adjust your gauge and try again or go down 1 hook size or up if it was too small the exact size isn t mission critical here remember yarn stretches so if you are a little tight here you are ok as long as your cup fits inside the circle large cup- main body r7 chain 1 single_crochet in same st as chain single_crochet around slip_stitch to join 24 r8 chain 1 single_crochet in same st as chain single_crochet around slip_stitch to join 24 r9 chain 1 single_crochet in same st as chain single_crochet around slip_stitch to join 24 r10 chain 1 single_crochet in same st as chain single_crochet around slip_stitch to join 24 r11 chain 1 single_crochet in same st as chain single_crochet around slip_stitch to join 24 r12 chain 1 single_crochet in same st as chain single_crochet around slip_stitch to join 24 r13 chain 1 single_crochet in same st as chain single_crochet around slip_stitch to join 24 r14 chain 1 half_double_crochet in same st as chain half_double_crochet around slip_stitch to join 24 r15 chain 1 single_crochet increase in 3rd loop same st as chain single_crochet in 3rd loop in next 3 sts *single_crochet increase in 3rd loop single_crochet in 3rd loop next 3 sts* slip_stitch to join 30 r16 chain 1 hhdc same st as chain single_crochet in next st * hhdc next st single_crochet next st * slip_stitch to join 30 r17 chain 1 single_crochet same st as chain hhdc in next st * single_crochet next st hhdc next st * slip_stitch to join 30 r18 chain 1 hhdc same st as chain single_crochet in next st * hhdc next st single_crochet next st * slip_stitch to join 30 r19 chain 1 single_crochet same st as chain hhdc in next st * single_crochet next st hhdc next st * slip_stitch to join 30 r20 chain 1 half_double_crochet in same st as chain half_double_crochet around slip_stitch to join 30 r21 chain 1 half_double_crochet in 3rd loop in same st as chain half_double_crochet in 3rd loop around slip_stitch to join 30 r22 chain 1 half_double_crochet in 3rd loop in same st as chain half_double_crochet in 3rd loop around slip_stitch to join 30 r23 chain 1 hhdc same st as chain single_crochet in next st * hhdc next st single_crochet next st * slip_stitch to join 30 r24 chain 1 single_crochet same st as chain hhdc in next st * single_crochet next st hhdc next st * slip_stitch to join 30 r25 chain 1 hhdc same st as chain single_crochet in next st * hhdc next st single_crochet next st * slip_stitch to join 30 corinna s corner custom crochet you may sell finished items please link to pattern listing pattern
